issue.title: [CI][Rust] Remove duplicated nightly job
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7333](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7333). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We run the same test on each push with GitHub Actions.
